page.title: 19Information in Uxbridge
page.content: You can get information on this area by reading the local newspapers such as the Gazette. the Leader and the Informer.Events like the Hillingdon Show are advertised on posters in shop windows too.Even gossip can spread information.The Yellow Pages and Thompsons Directory provide with us information about shops,banks and other commercial places.There is information on travel available from the Bus and Underground Station.There is also a Citizens Advice Bureau on the High St.Our Library provides information too on local clubs, societies and news.
